title: To all and every the constables of St. Clements Danes of the Dutchy Liberty, of Covent-garden, and St. Martins in the Fields
author: Throckmorton, William.
publisher: Printed by John Bill, Printer to the King's most Excellent Majesty,
notes: An order of the Knight Marshall respecting regulations to be observed at the King's coronation.
Dated and signed at end: Whitehall, by the authority above named, the eight day of April, one thousand six hundred sixty one.  William Throckmorton.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
